excerpt: Warm and comforting vegan butternut squash soup that's perfect for chilly days!

instructions.name: Soup
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic and saut√© until onion is translucent, about 3 minutes.
Add butternut squash, vegetable broth, curry powder, black pepper, and salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and let simmer for 25 minutes or until butternut squash is tender.
Using an immersion blender, blend the soup until smooth.
Stir in coconut milk and heat through.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped cilantro and toasted pumpkin seeds.

instructions.name: Garnish
instructions: In a dry skillet over medium heat, toast the pumpkin seeds until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and let cool.
